pullRequest.title: Allow custom path and class for spring-web codestart
pullRequest.bodyText:
Make sure that custom path and className are ignored when resteasy is selected (to avoid conflicts)
Add tests

Fixes #12604

commit.message:
Allow custom path and class for spring-web codestart

- Make sure that custom `path` and `className` are ignored when resteasy is selected (to avoid conflicts)
- Add tests

Fixes https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/12604

nodes.bodyText: I assume that's necessary but it's not clear why. In case of Spring these props aren't relevant? Are they still relevant for RESTEasy?
